description: A rally by extremists and football fans over the government's response ended in clashes with police.
title: Coronavirus: Far-right Rome protest turns briefly violent
title_page: Coronavirus: Far-right Rome protest turns briefly violent - BBC News
maintext: "We are here to make the whole world understand that today in Italy, every category of workers is devastated and destroyed by a government that in fact is not doing the interests of Italians," he told Reuters news agency.
